attributes.action: Ban ‘Pro Anna’ websites and have the creators prosicuted
attributes.additional_details: Now more then ever in the current society young women and men are seeing the ‘perfect image’ and are going online to find ways that they can make this possible, therefore they are finding the website that are encouraging them to develop an eating disorder.
attributes.background: Now online it is easy for young people to find website that a pro anorexia and they are convincing these individuals that this is the lifestyle that they should have and that it is a religion. This is causing more individuals to develop an eating disorders and become concerningly ill.
